name: VoidLoad
description:
This is VoidLoad, a fast paced dogfighting and resource collection game. A 3D and combat based take on the flash classic "MotherLoad". Currently it is in the prototyping stage, however all fundamental mechanics have been implemented. Have fun trying it out, it's free!

Features

  • Infinitely explorable voxel void
  • Fully destructable world
  • 5 different collectable "ores"
  • 5 tiers for 8 types of upgrades
  • Dogfighting

Explore!

Fight!

Collect!

Controls

Given in game.

Minimum Requirements

CPU : Intel i3 3225 / AMD FX 6300

GPU : Nvidia GTX 750 Ti / AMD HD 7750

Ram : 4 GB
